trans-unit.source: Provides caching services to the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"></xref> object in order to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: 提供快取服務<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"></xref>為了改善效能的物件。

trans-unit.source: Applications that use this caching mechanism are responsible for invalidating the content in the cache when it has changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用此快取機制的應用程式必須負責失效快取中的內容已變更時。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunCache"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRunCache"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the text engine client of a change to the cache when text content or text run properties of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"></xref> are added, removed, or replaced.
trans-unit.target: 通知文字引擎用戶端的快取的變更或文字的文字內容執行的內容時<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextRun"></xref>新增、 移除或取代。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> character index position of the start of the change.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref>字元索引位置開始的變更。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> characters to be added.
Indicates the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextSource"></xref> characters to be removed.
Signals the text engine client to invalidate the entire contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"></xref> cache.
trans-unit.target: 表示文字引擎用戶端要使其失效的整個內容<xref href="System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextFormatter"></xref>快取。

trans-unit.source: Invalidating the entire cache has the effect of emptying the cache.
trans-unit.target: 整個快取無效的效果的清空快取。

trans-unit.source: The cache refills with subsequent calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting> APIs.
trans-unit.target: 快取中重新填滿與後續呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting>應用程式開發介面。</xref:System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting>
